warp_41=`ret.y = saturate((1-abs(conwag-3)))*((1+roam_cos.y)*.8-p);
warp_42=`ret.z = saturate((1-abs(conwab-3)))*((1+roam_sin.x)*.86-p);
warp_43=`ret.x += saturate(max(1-abs(conwar-2),(1+roam_cos.z)*.93-abs(conwag-3)))*p;
warp_44=`ret.y += saturate(max(1-abs(conwag-2),(1+roam_sin.y)*1.01-abs(conwab-3)))*p;

comp_1=`
comp_2=`shader_body
comp_3=`{
comp_4=`    ret = tex2D(sampler_main, uv).xyz;
comp_5=`    //ret = max( ret, tex2D(sampler_main, 1-uv).zyx );
comp_6=`
comp_7=`    float L = lum(ret);
comp_8=`    float use_tex = 1 - saturate(L*10-1);
comp_9=`    
comp_10=`//mirror code by flexi
comp_11=`float2 uv2 =(6+2*roam_sin)*float2(1-uv.x,uv.y)-roam_sin;
comp_12=`float2 m = floor(frac(uv2*0.5)*2);
comp_13=`uv2 = frac(uv2)*(1-m) + (m)*frac(1-uv2);
comp_14=`
comp_15=`//texture/drop shadow code by Geiss
comp_16=`    float3 tex = .2+GetBlur1(uv2).yzx;
comp_17=`    tex = (tex-.25*GetBlur3(uv))*tex;
comp_18=`      // shadow:
comp_19=`      float L2 = lum(GetBlur2(uv - 0.01));
comp_20=`      tex *= 1-saturate(L2*5);
comp_21=`    ret = lerp(ret, tex, use_tex);
comp_22=`
comp_23=`    ret *= 1.70; //old gamma effect    
comp_24=`
comp_25=`
comp_26=`
comp_27=`}
